name: Trinity (itch) (Calnine, cannedmandarinorange)
description:
Trinity is a fast paced boss rush game where you control a group of cultists trying to destroy monstrous false gods. Your cult contains 3 types of units with one that can shoot fireballs, one that can create a magic shield, and one that can raise the dead as zombies. Use these magical powers to defeat the boss while not allowing all of your cult to perish.

Credits:

Game Design by Andre Lebecki & Tingxuan Gu

Sound Design by Riley Larkin & Pixie Lu

Sprites made using MMORPG Maker

Logo made using Cooltext.com
